description:
•	Battery Life Calculator is very useful for all.
•	This app will calculate the number of hours your battery going to dry.
•	 This app will accepts Capacity of battery and Current consumption of device and it displays the estimated battery life.
•	 Very easy to use & intuitive application.

Note: 
The output of this calculator does not guarantee that you will get the determined battery life. Other factors such as weather condition (temperature, humidity, etc.), and battery condition can extend/shorten the battery life. This calculator is not valid for alkaline batteries.
